page.title: 17TRANSPORT
page.content: The city lies in an extremely attractive transport network. The mainline rail service links BRISTOL and LONDON. An easily accessible motorway system is close by _ M4 and M5. Access to ferries can be WEYMOUTH or SWANSEA and there are airports at BRISTOL and CARDIFF. The attraction of the area is that : a) people can live in a beautiful city or the surrounding country and commute to Bristol or London; b)small firms can establish themselves in the city and its environs and be served by an excellent communications system.
